name: SaaS B2B – Mid-Market Marketing Manager
description: Marketing manager at mid-sized tech company (50–200 employees) in NA/EU, overseeing digital campaigns.

usage_by_company_size.small: Target pain points with free trials and personal outreach.
usage_by_company_size.mid: Segment campaigns by industry and use webinars for engagement.
usage_by_company_size.large: Dedicated sales teams, emphasize scalability and integration.

update_tips: Analyze CRM data quarterly; adjust for new marketing channels or regulations.

name: SaaS B2B – Enterprise Security-Focused CIO
description: CIO/CISO at large enterprise (5,000+ employees) in regulated industry like finance or healthcare.

usage_by_company_size.small: Highlight niche innovations; gain trust via certifications.
usage_by_company_size.mid: Account-based sales, show industry-specific case studies.
usage_by_company_size.large: Executive briefings, full-service integration and compliance solutions.

update_tips: Update with changing threat landscape and regulations; monitor cyber trends.
